text: @marcorubio @RosemarieBrown3 @GovRonDeSantis You go from wear the damn mask to stop being so negative. Wow. What “good” news do you want reported? COVID19 cases are rising, Trump thinks the virus is gone, he has no plan for a second term other than “what about me?”  Please. Y’all spent 8 years trashing Obama and no plan.
